attributes.review: This app is terrible it supports orange pigs which is weird because pigs aren’t supposed to be orange🤔. Also it took about 3 weeks just to get inside the app and it messed with the rest of my phone. For example my phone started showing me more and more pictures and news articles of this orange pig looking thing named trump? I think it was. Anyways it was a scary thing. This pig was a child predator, a racist, etc. he supported violence and wanted nothing more than power over the whole u.s. it reminded me of a horror movie. I 1000/10 DO NOT recommend you download🙂 Thankyou for your time
attributes.title: THIS IS THE WORST APP IVE EVER HAD IN MY LIFE

attributes.review: Words can not describe how long it takes for the app to actually download. In all honesty I’m very disappointed knowing our president, I would think he would get a fast moving app. It’s very much irrelevant in my opinion I just wanted to see.The president is mainly a disappointment and I don’t understand why this app is even available at this point.please take its down love and peace ❤️ and oh please save TikTok ✨
